DESCRIPTION:
Action from the third person, in which you have to drive a police team in the near future. The future is not a rainbow - the surviving ecological catastrophe the world in which humanity is divided into "high" - the inhabitants of the skyscrapers around which there is clean air, and "inferior" living on the earth in the smog obscures the sky, and radioactive waste. "Lower" periodically raise the uprising against the ruling "higher", and they, in turn, suppress them, using "special purpose units", one of them and go at your disposal.

- MANUAL 
- WALLPAPERS 
- CONCEPT ART 
- AVATARS
